website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for white-haired cats who love to get messy.
pros: Shampoo lathers well and is easy to rinse out
Effectively cleans and brightens white fur
Noticeable results after just one wash
Gentle formula leaves fur conditioned and shiny
cons: Strong citrus scent may be overpowering for some cats and owners

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Teddy Bear dog she is only 10 lbs. & I have tried every expensive & inexpensive whitening shampoo there is! This one far exceeded my expectations! I put some on each paw & rub it in really good. You will actually see while you are washing your dog the whitening effect. After the shampoo, I use Chi conditioner. Mia is is so white & fluffy afterwards! I promise you will not be disappointed with this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Holly R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was searching for shampoo that whisper white dogs. Well this particular shampoo said Veterinary white shampoo on it and that caught my eye and got good rating so I went ahead and bought it and I love it worksreally good
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Veterinary Formula Solutions SynergyLabs Snow White Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The only shampoo I can use with or without conditioner for my brown and white Parti Pom. My black and white Parti passed last year and had multiple allergies but this shampoo really worked great and didn't upset his allergies. Black and white Parti Pom is Georgie now an angel and my brown and white Parti Pom is Chad, just over a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Seraph

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog's eyes very red and irritated
customer_reviews.text: This product made my dogs eyes turn really red and the skin around them was very irritated for a couple days. After I finished giving her a bath, she went outside and rolled in the dirt to get the residual product out of her eyes/face. After this, I had to give her another bath. This product is not for dogs with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have two bichons and I purchased this last because it also had a conditioner. I found that it didn't work as well as far as whitening as a previous product I used called (Synergy Groomer's Blend Pet Shampoo, Ultra White, 18.4 fl Oz). I'll go back to using that when I've used this up so that I'll get better whitening results.
customer_reviews.author: thewho

customer_reviews.title: Light refreshing scent
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo makes my kid's fur very soft and bright. No he doesn't look bright light white, nor should being a Westie. The scent is pleasant, NOT heavy perfume. Having vitamins helps moisturize his skin. Plus it's priced reasonably for having many benefits. Thanks ARF
customer_reviews.author: LKP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't brighten the white coat as stated.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package the cap had opened and the shampoo had leaked all over the bottle. This must have happened before because they had it wrapped inside several layers of twist tied baggies. I have now used the shampoo for 4 baths on my white Maltipoo puppy. It doesn't seem to make a difference in brightening up white fur and the clean shampoo smell doesn't last. It is the same as any other dog shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie M. West

customer_reviews.title: Thankful
customer_reviews.text: I have two Great Pyrenees solid white, they play outside a lot. This product brings the white back to their fur.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for white fur
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo on our 8 month old Great Pyrenees. It whitens his fur really well. When we wash him outside, you can see the difference in the fur that has the shampoo on it and the fur that hasn’t been washed yet. It almost looks like a black light is getting the fur to glow white. Sounds weird, but you can definitely see the whitening action. It’s gentle and smells good. We go through a lot because our dog is a big boy. Also, it doesn’t keep him smelling fresh and clean for long. If you’re looking for a whitening shampoo for a good price, this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Petrilla

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is white puppy approved!!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several times. It's the best shampoo for white dogs that we have tried. It lathers well, smells nice and not overpowering. Our pooch gets SO soft and it even removed dirt that is hard to clean, like charcoal smudges and oily stuff that active romping dogs get into. English Bull Terriers (as are many short haired white dogs) are prone to skin allergies and sensitivities, yet this product has NEVER caused any skin irritations. And we have been using it for almost 2 years. It does not seem to bother her eyes either. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: They must have changed their ingredients because I purchased this before in store (exact brand and whitening edition) And it worked like magic. My dogs were Snow White. I was excited to find it here but highly disappointed after using it. I bathed both of my poodles and their coats didn’t come white/bright. This is also in a different color. They used to make this in silver. This seems to be a cheaper version of a product that was once magnificent. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Wilbert

customer_reviews.title: Terrific! Bright white!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my white-and-black (large spots) mixed terrier mutt. Now, when we're in the sunlight the white parts of his fur almost look like it's glowing. Also, I was using people/human shampoo before this, and the scent was Way Too Strong for the dog. This scent is very mild, as is the shampoo. I can wash him weekly without worrying that I'm drying his skin or his fur. Great product, so glad I found it, will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kirpeche

customer_reviews.title: Whitens coat well
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using another regular dog shampoo on our maltipoo, but he never really looked quite clean. This shampoo really whitens his coat. The difference is vast. Now he looks presentable when next to other little white dogs. Before, you could really tell he hadn’t been groomed in a long time (he’s had several grooms while my hair hasn’t been cut since March!). The price is reasonable, too. Some of the dog shampoos are way too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sbmargo

customer_reviews.title: In the past it smelled like white tea
customer_reviews.text: I failed to read the description of this shampoo, and ordered it based on past experience with this product, which I purchased directly from the pet store. In the past it smelled like white tea, and was very pleasant. I am assumping that the formula has changed. This shampoo smells like grapefruits. If you like that, buy two bottles! I however, do not and was sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bottle with open top on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The fog shampoo arrived with shampoo in the bag and from the picture you can see least 2-3 ozs are gone, not to mention the mess of shampoo all inside the wrapping and on the bottle. I looked in the bag for a top that broke off in transit and no luck. Shampoo smells good hopefully will keep my puppy Maltipoo nice and white. Product may be good but packaging a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I definitely think this is worth the money! I have a playful and messy boy beagle puppy. Between the accidents he has sometimes and just planning outside with his sibling and getting muddy, it has been nearly impossible to get the stains off his white belly and chest. This product has done wonders! After a few bathes, the staines were almost nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cowsert

customer_reviews.title: No whitening.
customer_reviews.text: I used once and saw no difference in the color of my dogs stained hair. I shampooed her up and let it sit for a couple minutes. No whitening yet. Maybe after a few uses it may work??
customer_reviews.author: Annette Ball

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no smell.
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our Maltese. Works great at brightening him up and he’s always nice and fluffy. Not much of a scent, which is not always a bad thing. He doesn’t smell like dog but doesn’t smell like a bottle of perfume either.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Bright White Fur
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to get tear/ water stains off of my dog's fur. It worked. I saw improvements after the first wash. Constant use and his fur is back to a bright white!
customer_reviews.author: Marca Grant

customer_reviews.title: Very lathery and leaves my puppy's fur soft and with a nice light aroma
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has a cute bottle and lathers up very easily. Love the design of the bottle and leaves my maltipoo puppy fresh and clean. During the bath my puppy was never irritated by the shampoo, like other pet shampoo has. I would recommend this product for its quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Silas L

customer_reviews.title: Not a real whitening shampoo
customer_reviews.text: It did NOT whiten my Maltese puppy's fur ANY better than Oster Oatmeal shampoo did. I used them both a few days apart to compare, and while this shampoo smells nice and clean a well, it DOES NOT make her fur appear any brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Granny14

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maltese and sometimes her hair loses its luster. This shampoo does whiten the hair, smells good and makes the hair soft
customer_reviews.author: armando t. bess

customer_reviews.title: Bright White Coat
customer_reviews.text: I have Dogo Argentinos that like to play rough in the dirt and this shampoo keeps their coat nice and bright white. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zeraphim

customer_reviews.title: never saw our dog whiter!!
customer_reviews.text: we washed our white bishon frise with this shampoo and couldn't believe how white he got his fur glistened!! Also how soft his fur got. My daughter has a teacup pom that is tan and white.One day when she left the dog with us we bathed her and she asked what we did to Sadie because she noticed her fur shimmering and then felt how soft she was. She buys it now too!! when out walking them both people comment on their beautiful fur! Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Westie who LOVES to get dirty! his shampoo works perfectly BUT a little bit goes a long way! The scent is not overpowering and his fur is super soft afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a mix bichon/poo that is black and white.. sometimes her white fur starts to look a bit dingy, I bathed her in this and it did brighten her fur. You are supposed to leave it on for a few but my girl hates bath time so I try and make it as quick as possible
customer_reviews.author: Martie K

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: After 5 washes I could see the staining really starting to fade but her fur was looking a little dry and not as shiny. So I would recommend switching between this and a conditioning shampoo every other bath. It does work better than any others I've tried though so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: ECJ

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo for my white Maltipoo
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a good price. I use very little when sometimes 'spot cleaning', around his back area and feet that get a bit discolored, and it really helps. I don't use a lot nor have I used it near his face as of yet, but it seems gentle and effective.
customer_reviews.author: KBinBoston

customer_reviews.title: Why is it filled with glitter?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why it is filled with fine glitter, but I got this because I wanted a whitening dog shampoo without coconut. Well, it does not have coconut, but it also doesn’t whiten or do much to get your dog clean.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi-Daos

customer_reviews.title: Best whitening shampoo for dogs. No irritation!
customer_reviews.text: I have been invent a medicine for 30 years now and this is the best shampoo I have seen that whitens my dogs fur and hair. Great price. You use less than other brands because it suds up nice!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Rich lather, great smell but whitening is average.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get my dog as white or as soft other reviews stated or other brands I've used. It is really thick & creamy & smells good which I did like. I don't bathe her often myself just in between groomer appointments so it's ok for those occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Just Inga

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so good! My dog looks so much lighter and doesn’t have that yellowish tint to her anymore. Love this stuff definitely buying more! Great price
customer_reviews.author: Molldoll

customer_reviews.title: Works well but smells awful
customer_reviews.text: It did a good job and left my dog’s fur shiny and white. It stinks though. I had to put my conditioner on the dog so I could stand the smell. Probably won’t buy again just due to the smell
customer_reviews.author: Amy N Gavin

customer_reviews.title: ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I just got this last night and I bathed my cat Rosé this morning. Her coat is mostly white white black patches. The white part of her fur is usually pretty clean, but the underneath gets discolored, I believe from dirt on the floor?! Idk. Anywho, so I bathed Rosé, she was not thrilled at all. So my thoughts of the product.. the smell is mild, which is nice. My cats fur is baby soft. The Snow White feature of the product, decent. She’s less discolored for sure, but maybe with more use her fur will change more. 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: MICROPLASTICS
customer_reviews.text: Once I received this shampoo I realized the "patented optical brighteners" are essentially very small glitter pieces. I would never lick glitter off my own skin so i'm not going to apply it to my cat's coat for her to lick off herself. no thanks, refund or trash-not using this nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: cassey

customer_reviews.title: White as snow
customer_reviews.text: My English bulldogs were a creamy white because they love to go outside, this shampoo made them bright white, and it stayed white. Not too harsh on their sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: mmsmms

customer_reviews.title: Dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Liked but I think our dog needs something a little stronger he smelled good for a couple of days and needs another bath I thinks it’s the dog not the product I have tried many other shampoos would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gisele blount

customer_reviews.title: Works great bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: Smell is awful Is the main con other is spillage during shipping! Other than that works phenomenally. See photo. Used on my standard poodle.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Work great on white chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my white chihuahua. I like the scent and it lathers very well. I use it on her ones a week or and it hasn’t dried out her skin, if anything it keeps her coat nice white and minimizes shedding.
customer_reviews.author: 00D

customer_reviews.title: Spilled in box, smells good though
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived spilled out into the box, even through the plastic bag that it came in. Not sure if it works or not but it made my hands smell nice! Update: I noticed when I stopped using this that my dog's beard didn't stay as white as it did when I used this, so I guess it does work, even a little.
customer_reviews.author: RiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I was spending quite a lot of money at the groomer to keep him looking nice. After searching Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have a solid white, 14 pound Maltipoo type that I adopted from the Humane Society. I was spending quite a lot of money at the groomer to keep him looking nice. After searching Amazon, I found the shampoo and it's amazing how a quick bath with this shampoo cleans and brightens his coat that can get dingy fairly quickly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Amazing white!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product to whiten fur. My baby is light brown and white, after this she is just beautiful! It doesn’t really have a smell which is fine, rinses clean, fur is super soft and bright afterwords.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hollingbery

customer_reviews.title: So White
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Service Animal who as you can see he is white. I tried other shampoos but always looked kind of yellowish and with this shampoo he is just a bright color of white. I love it and will continue to purchase this product. I always get complements on how white he is and tell them about the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: M.Castillo

customer_reviews.title: loves this
customer_reviews.text: this shampoo does exactly what its supposed to do my puppy is nice and white as she should be
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Results
customer_reviews.text: My dog's coat came out cleaner, softer, whiter than any other shampoo I've used on her. It was noticeable and people commented on it. Smelled wonderful, too.
customer_reviews.author: fishgirl

customer_reviews.title: My kitty is white again!
customer_reviews.text: I have used similar products that have been either ineffective at whitening or actually did whiten, but left my baby itching from the ingredients. This product does the job without the unwanted side effect.
customer_reviews.author: NevinMoore

customer_reviews.title: Recommended By AKC Breeder
customer_reviews.text: We bought this shampoo because it was recommended by our puppy’s AKC breeder. She said she uses it for all of her dogs and puppies. After bathing our puppy with this once she came out smelling pretty and her fur was very soft. My daughter loved the smell of the shampoo
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product for white dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect value for the money. The smell is a little offputting but the product works well. My dogs coat is left very smooth and white. This is a repeat purchase for me. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Yes I recommend this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Goldendoodle and this shampoo is great. Cooper gets a bath every week so gentle , good smelling, great value is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: Did my dingy dog turn brute white after one bath? Not exactly, but she looks much better than before (when I was using regular shampoo) and her coat is super soft and fluffy. Maybe it’ll bleach out the stains over time
customer_reviews.author: Faith4482

customer_reviews.title: Check the cap!
customer_reviews.text: Most the shampoo was in the bag, the cap wasn't tight, so it's a total waste of money if u can't check the cap before sending
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Tami

customer_reviews.title: This is great shampoo for white dogs
customer_reviews.text: this shampoo works really well. The coat is soft and shiney and the stains are coming out nicely. (How do you spell shiney?)
customer_reviews.author: peter Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great whitening shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product, whitens with ease. Use as directed and it will work just fine. Also doesn’t causes allergies of itching.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Bischon puppy. It helped whiten his fur.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Effective and good value
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo to clean my dog’s paws after walking her outside. She has a tan coat around her body and white fur around her paws. This shampoo really made a difference to clean her paws and to restore the white fur color. It is also effective against pink fur stains caused by licking.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bella the Pomchi

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I like this shampoo. A little goes a long way. It brightens the white portions of his coat.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Maltese puppy that I have been using this on and I can definitely tell a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Allen

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: this work s great on whiting the the dog hair, also smells good
customer_reviews.author: SSP

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money and then some 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This soap is awesome, Best soap we use jet on your little Layla 😁 she smells so good and her hair is extremely soft! Highly recommend this shampoo 🏆
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I can definitely see whitening but you have to do a few times a week to remove stains well
customer_reviews.author: Estrella Villatoro

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: i like the sent, but my fur kids seem to be allergic to it, so i used it 2x's & stopped.
customer_reviews.author: sandysab1

customer_reviews.title: must have for white pets
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my white cat and white dog, it definitely helps the fur to look clean and white
customer_reviews.author: V. Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, I want it in gallon size. It whitens great and the scent is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Doll

customer_reviews.title: Review for both shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: Finally! This is the best shampoo. A little goes a long way, smells awesome, very gentle on my maltipoos.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: Did not make the white whiter. Softness good. Only tried once, will see how it goes on next wash.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your dog doesn't have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just the brand but it seemed to aggravate my dogs skin. Smells great and it did whiten up her white patches.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Byrd

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get the dog very white.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get my dogs hair as white as it needs to be. Other than that it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy MB Wright

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product
customer_reviews.text: This product does not do anything it claims. Scam for collect money. If there was an option I would grade it negative. My dog’s white hair are getting perl therefore I bough this. After using it they are excerpt same and moreover he lost so much hai after applying this product. Worst for white dog.
customer_reviews.author: yudhishthir singh

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo is good
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived with the bottle cap open. some of the shampoo leaked into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: lagunasyl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, did not whiten and left coat dry and dull.
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Silken Windhound. I followed directions and was diligent about rinsing. This shampoo did not whiten any better than my own non-whitening shampoo used on him previously . It also left his normally silky soft coat dry and dull to the touch. Coat was worse than before bathing. Waste of money and I’m sad at the damage to his beautiful coat.
customer_reviews.author: Kohldebb

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my white powder puff dogs hair white. I use a conditioner after wash so dont know about the lingering scent on her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t help with the white fur as stated even after bathing the dogs a few times
customer_reviews.author: Lopeka

customer_reviews.title: Makes white dogs brilliantly white
customer_reviews.text: Good lather, spread, and rinse. Makes white dog coats brilliant and bright.
customer_reviews.author: SOMETIMES ALWAYS NEVER

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Not sure my dog looks any whiter but it works to clean her.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Okay not the greatest for cleaning an oily skin dog
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed, shampoo was both packaged correctly. Bottle was crushed, too broken off and shampoo leaked out in the package!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bichon and this shampoo gets her white and fluffy clean!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smells great shine unbelievable 🐾
customer_reviews.text: Wow great shampoo! Price too. My Dobie looks great! No drying het out just shine..
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie-jane

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the shampoo....... It does not bring out the white in the dog. The bottle is a very hard plastic which makes trying to squeeze product out a difficult process. Does not lather up like I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Don Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Ummm no..
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt seem to really clean my dogs skins and it has no real scent. I will not buy again it didnt satisfy my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Soft and white as snow...
customer_reviews.text: Our Havanese just can not keep her beard clean so we decided to give this shampoo a shot since she is primarily white. It smells great and washed out easily, only used two coats and her beard is already white again! Also noticed she is fluffier then usual and no pink sensitivity like her previous shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dean

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: It works. The cat fur so soft after and more white. Maybe after the future showers will be more whiter.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Buestan

customer_reviews.title: I’ll keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: Gets my dog back to white, and I LOVE the smell of the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really great dog shampoo. The scent is really clean and it's been a few days that I used it on my dog. And still smells great. Hair really soft. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I like the lovely smell that leaves in my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have a white little dog this shampoo has makes his coat like silver he looks so amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying more it makes my dogs white hair whiter thats what we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hurst

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo, I've purchased it several times along with another from the same brand to reduce shedding. My Pepper's fur is very white after continuous use (and the shedding is reduced substantially with the use of the other shampoo).
customer_reviews.author: Kay K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Smelled soooo good and got the stains off my white puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Aw89

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t wirk
customer_reviews.text: does not whiten a small back and white dog Paws still yellow
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I love the smells on my dogs hair , I have eight poodles. I recommend this shampoo 😍
customer_reviews.author: Liriola L Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth shampoo I like it for my white cat
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrific
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells amazing and really makes the light colored dogs brighter
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat white
customer_reviews.text: I like the fruity smell of this shampoo but it didn’t reach my expectation. My dog’s beard still a little bit yellow. Her paws are somewhat yellowish. Maybe I should keep the shampoo longer than 2 minutes on my dog’s beard. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Jorel

customer_reviews.title: Stains-B-Gone
customer_reviews.text: My dog's coat was stained by a black harness. The stain is GONE and his coat is brighter, fluffier, and softer!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Quality shampoo for white fur coats.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shampoo & provides a bright shine to my fur baby's coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Davis-Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Smells great too
customer_reviews.text: My puppy isint a white dog but his coat came out shiny and clean yet all the while feeling soft! Smells great too
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Leaves no scent at all on your pet
customer_reviews.text: This product has no smell to it at all after you rinse it off your pet,you can not even tell or pet was washed by the smell,need to leave some kind of good scent to it!
customer_reviews.author: CINDY

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: If you have a white cat or white dog this is the perfect shampoo to use on them it make they fur looks and feel great ❤
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: When i wash my dog's white beard every day or two it stays looking white. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Wow it really works. Used it on my car and dog. Super white and soft coat smells good
customer_reviews.text: Wow it really works. Used it on my car and dog. Super white and soft coat smells good

product_meta.title: Veterinary Formula Solutions Snow White Shampoo for Dogs and Cats – Safely Remove Stains Without Bleach or Peroxide –Gently Cleanses, Deodorizes and Brightens White Coat – Fresh Scent (17oz)
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1For white dogs and cats, finding a gentle shampoo that will cleanse, moisturize and brighten without the use of harsh ingredients is challenging. Snow White Shampoo is specially formulated for pets with white coats to effectively remove stains and coat yellowing without using bleach or peroxide. Patented optical brighteners safely eliminate the appearance of yellowing and dingy fur while bringing out your pet’s natural bright white coat. Making you and your once not-so-white dog or cat very happy! The gentle coconut-oil based cleansers in the 17 oz. bottle of Veterinary Formula Solutions Snow White Shampoo will leave your pet’s coat clean, fresh, moisturized and shiny. The mild shampoo contains Vitamin E and green tea extract, and is pH balanced specifically for your pet’s skin. The exceptional long-lasting blue coral citrus fragrance has patented fragrance extenders so your clean and white pet will smell amazing long after bath time is over. It is gentle enough for frequent use and will not wash away topical spot-on flea and tick treatments. For best results, follow bath with Veterinary Formula Ultra Oatmeal Moisturizing Conditioner and finish with our Gloss and Glide Detangler and Conditioner Spray. Safe for horses too. We know that your dogs and cats are more than just pets - they are part of the family - so Veterinary Formula Solutions designs premium cleansing products that pet parents can actually afford. Your pet will once again have a bright, white coat and you will like knowing that no harsh ingredients were used to get it that way – making you both happy and able to focus on more important things like snuggles, games and treats.
feature_bullets: FOR WHITE DOGS AND CATS – Snow White Shampoo is specially formulated for dogs and cats with white coats. Patented optical brighteners safely eliminate the appearance of yellowing, stains and dingy fur while bringing out your pet’s natural bright white coat.
LONG LASTING FRAGRANCE – The exceptional long-lasting blue coral citrus fragrance has patented fragrance extenders so your clean and white pet will smell amazing long after bath time is over.

NO BLEACH OR PEROXIDE – Snow White shampoo contains no bleach or peroxide that might irritate your pet’s skin. With gentle Vitamin E and green tea extract, your pet’s coat will be free from stains and back to its natural bright white color.
SAFE FOR DOGS, CATS AND HORSES – Snow White shampoo is pH balanced for your pet’s sensitive skin. It will not wash away topical spot-on flea and tick treatments.

EFFECTIVE AND AFFORDABLE– SynergyLab’s Veterinary Formula Solutions cleansing products are created with premium ingredients but available at a price that pet parents can afford. We know your dogs and cats are more than just pets, because we are pet parents too.
